ctu_text: ", "answer": "According to the instructions of the government, the accounts of all the beneficiaries coming under Ramnagar and Haldwani tehsil of Nainital district-Haridwar, Udham Singh Nagar, Dehradun (except the mountainous areas of Chakrata, Kalsi and Raipur blocks) should be compulsorily opened in nationalized banks. And there are instructions to compulsorily open bank accounts for the beneficiaries coming within a 3 km radius of the bank in hilly areas.
